channel.title: The server is . . . sped up? Need some help
channel.description:
Well, I haven't had this problem until this morning, I started up my source, and everything is, faster. When I run in-game, I run faster then a RuneScape character should. All the NPC's walk around faster than they should, dialogue heads move faster then usual. I am 99% sure it's client sided. I'm using Galkons Refractored Client and I'm using a blank Delta. Nothing comes up in the CMD.
If anyone could help solve the issue, I'd be grateful.

item.title: The server is . . . sped up? Need some help
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

This happened to me in RuneScape years ago. Restart your computer and internet modem, see if it fixes things.

Read full topic
item.source: The server is . . . sped up? Need some help
